basics.name: Pratchaya Uepisitkul
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: I am a Web Developer with experience in building CMS, creating APIs, and working with technologies like React, Node.js, and Express. I focus on improving operational efficiency through innovative web solutions, particularly in e-commerce and warehouse management.

courses: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures Certification (FCC)
Back End Development and APIs Certification (FCC)

work.summary: As a Web Developer at ITCity, I have been involved in developing and maintaining CMS platforms, designing and implementing APIs, and building web applications to streamline business operations. I have focused on improving efficiency through problem-solving and applying suitable technologies, particularly for e-commerce and warehouse management tasks.
highlights: Developed a new CMS to improve content management across various platforms, such as creating forms for data entry.
Designed APIs and databases for use with web applications.
Created a system for managing packaging and shipping processes, enhancing efficiency in the warehouse and reducing errors in product deliveries.
Improved organizational efficiency by providing solutions and addressing problems with appropriate technologies.
Developed web applications according to company requirements.
